definition: A figure of speech in which one word has a double meaning within a sentence.
A mixture of seemingly unrelated things
Being lovely; describes someone who acts charmingly to appear cute and appealing.
Clueless; This phrase is used to describe someone who does not read the air; someone who is slow-witted.
Unbelievable. The meaning slightly changes depending on the situation. It could also mean 'What the hell,' 'I cannot believe it,' 'beyond common sense,' and so on.
Without sense; used to describe a situation that is so ridiculous it defies all logic
Finished work; often refers to happy hour or drinks after work.
